title: Image captioning
description: Creation of a workflow for classifying, denoising and then captioning an image

title: Reconfiguration of a WAN Network: Harmonisation of Infrastructures and Optimisation of Services
description: The project aims to harmonise a WAN network by interconnecting 2 to 3 pilot sites in order to centralise management, improve security and reduce costs.

title: Project Automation
description: Automating a manual task on a production line

title: Projet Intelligence Artificielle
description: Data cleaning for quality assurance and exploratory analysis to identify trends. Various machine learning algorithms were evaluated using cross-validation, measuring performance to identify key factors.

title: Walter Protocol Bridge
description: Built functional bridges between protocols based on prototypes, and RFID documentation.

title: Optimisation of Delivery Routes
description: The design and implementation of a solution algorithm (Python), and an experimental study on the performance of the solution.

title: Cloud Healthcare Unit Project
description: Setting up a Data Warehouse. The goal was to design a scalable infrastructure capable of extracting, storing and analysing this data while ensuring high security and optimum performance.

title: Virtualia V4
description: Upgrade from V3 desktop version to V4 web version
